Question: Usually, this person was a representative for everyone going through a time when they feel like nothing ever goes right for them.
Hints: This person does many things for Snoopy, and Snoopy normally appreciates it, but sometimes he doesn't.
For instance, on April 15, 1953, Lucy tries to steal all of this person's caramels when he offers her one.
In the TV special "A **** Thanksgiving," he identifies himself as "this person" when calling his own grandmother on the phone.
